code: public String getFirstSentence(String text) {     if (text == null) {         return null.     }     int dot = text.indexOf('.').     if (dot != -1) {         BreakIterator breakIterator = BreakIterator.getSentenceInstance(Locale.US).         breakIterator.setText(text).         String sentence = text.substring(breakIterator.first(), breakIterator.next()).         return removeSpaceBetweenLine(sentence.trim()).     } else {         String[] lines = text.split(System.lineSeparator()).         return lines[0].trim().     } }
private String removeSpaceBetweenLine(String text) {     String[] lines = text.split(System.lineSeparator()).     return Arrays.stream(lines).map(String::trim).collect(Collectors.joining(" ")). }
